title: Business of Sports: Fantasy Football Week 2
itunes:title: Business of Sports: Fantasy Football Week 2
description:
Michael Barr, Rich Trueman, and Damian Sassower reflect on week 1 of NFL action, and look ahead to week 2. Check out Rich’s fantasy football column every Thursday on the Bloomberg Terminal.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
